name: Idle Painter 3D
description:
Feeling stressed or bored? simulating idle & paint must be one of the best relaxing ways. Get the incredibly addicting idle game that everyone is talking about!

Idle Painter 3D offers you colorful low poly artworks like cute animals, modern illustrations, fruits, characters and so on. Dive into a whole new 3D models experience! Relax and enjoy the masterpieces you will create!

HOW TO PLAY?
● Tap to upgrade pen and speed to create your own 3D painting models.
● Swipe to roate your painting models.
● DIY your models with various pens and paint sprays to for a higher selling price.
● Make stunning 3D models, sell them and upgrade your painting strength!

WHY PLAY?
● Escape from boredom and stimulate your mind by painting the beautiful low poly 3D models of Idle Painter 3D
● Over 300+ low poly models
● Easy and relax at first, and gets addicting fast!
● What are you waiting for now?

FEATURES：
● MY GALLERY. Various models for all tastes
● EVOLVING LEVELS. Paint more models and unlock new models
● LOTS OF LEVEL. Play over 300+ levels with more coming soon!
● UPGRADE STRENGTH. Get more coins and upgrade more strength to be a paint master!
● UNLOCK PENS and PAINT SPRAY. Decorate your low poly models and sell for a higher price
● SHARE with FRIENDS. Show your amazing works of art
● MORE!
